text: Aluísio Francisco da Luz (1 March 1931 – 19 April 2020), simply known as Índio, was a Brazilian footballer. He was born in Cabedelo, Paraíba. He played for the Brazil national team. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Paraíba
title: Índio (footballer, born 1931)
